title: The Equations of Motion
text: Use the formula: $$v=u+a t$$, where v is the final velocity (6.00m/s in this case), u is the initial velocity (0 $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in this case), a is the acceleration, and $$t$$ is the time.

title: Time Calculation
text: Rearrange the equation $$v=u+a t$$ to solve for $$t$$.
